SEARCH
Package org.opencastproject.workingfilerepository.impl

Class WorkingFileRepositoryImpl

java.lang.Object
org.opencastproject.workingfilerepository.impl.WorkingFileRepositoryImpl
All Implemented Interfaces:
org.opencastproject.storage.StorageUsage, org.opencastproject.workingfilerepository.api.PathMappable, org.opencastproject.workingfilerepository.api.WorkingFileRepository
Direct Known Subclasses:
WorkingFileRepositoryRestEndpoint
public class WorkingFileRepositoryImpl extends Object implements org.opencastproject.workingfilerepository.api.WorkingFileRepository, org.opencastproject.workingfilerepository.api.PathMappable
A very simple (read: inadequate) implementation that stores all files under a root directory using the media package ID as a subdirectory and the media package element ID as the file name.

    • toSafeName

      public String toSafeName(String fileName)
      Returns the filename translated into a version that can safely be used as part of a file system path. The method shortens both the base file name and the extension to a maximum of 255 characters each, and replaces unsafe characters with <doce>_</doce>.
      Specified by:
      toSafeName in interface org.opencastproject.workingfilerepository.api.WorkingFileRepository
      Parameters:
      fileName - The file name
      Returns:
      the safe version

    • getFile

      protected File getFile(String mediaPackageID, String mediaPackageElementID) throws IllegalStateException, org.opencastproject.util.NotFoundException
      Returns the file to the media package element.
      Parameters:
      mediaPackageID - the media package identifier
      mediaPackageElementID - the media package element identifier
      Returns:
      the file or null if no such element exists
      Throws:
      IllegalStateException - if more than one matching elements were found
      org.opencastproject.util.NotFoundException - if the file cannot be found in the Working File Repository

      fileName - the file name
      Returns:
      the file
      Throws:
